entries.title: Arizona judge: State can enforce near-total abortion ban
entries.description: The only exemption is if the woman’s life is in jeopardy.

entries.title: World Bank president says he will not resign, apologizes for remarks on climate science
entries.description: “When asked, ‘Are you a climate denier?’ I should’ve said no,” Malpass said.

entries.title: The untold story of Trump's botched impeachments
entries.description: Rachael Bade, Playbook’s co-author, and Karoun Demirjian, national security reporter at the Washington Post, pull back the curtain on Congress in their hotly anticipated new book, "Unchecked: The Untold Story Behind Congress's Botched Impeachments of Donald Trump.”
